Description: Enable/disable visibility of legend that has been created using the `legend` kwarg
Hex color string for the legend border
Width of the legend border in pixels
Font size of the legend text

Position of the legend {0 = `outside`; 1 = `upper right`; 2 = upper left`; 3 = `lower left`; 4 = `lower right`; 5 = `right`; 6 = `center left`; 7 = `center right`; 8 = `lower center`; 9 = `upper center`; 10 = `center`; 11 = `below`}
Transparency value for legend markers between 0-1
Marker size in the legend in pixels
Number of points in the legend region for each entry [to enable multiple markers as in matplotlib]
Custom title for the legend region [default is the column name used for the legend grouping]
